name: Nailbiter

name: The Victim

name: Montana Sky
summary_text: The wealthy stock dealer bequeaths his Montana farm to the three daughters provided they would live there together at least for a year.

name: The Human Contract
summary_text: A successful corporate type harboring a deep, dark secret befriends a free-spirited stranger who encourages him to ditch his stuffy lifestyle and live life in reckless abandon.

name: Post Impact
summary_text: After a meteor strike starts a new ice age, a group of survivors tries to find a device that could give mankind new hope

name: Tezaab
summary_text: A college student, who wants to join the army and serve his country, becomes a criminal due to unforeseen circumstances.

name: King of the Zombies

name: Son
summary_text: When a young boy contracts a mysterious illness, his mother must decide how far she will go to protect him from terrifying forces in her past.

name: Fuera de carta
summary_text: Javier Cámara (Talk to Her) stars as Chef Maxi, a culinary genius/drama queen with too much on his plate.

name: Undead or Alive: A Zombedy
summary_text: Elmer Winslow is a soldier on the run from the Union Army, and Luke Budd is a cowboy with a broken heart. When the two misfits rob the corrupt sheriff of an old west town, they have no idea that a plague of zombies is sweeping the country, or that Geronimo's sexy niece may be their only hope of survival.

name: Café Transit
summary_text: "Cafe Transit" depicts an independent-minded widow who bucks tradition to run her dead husband's truck stop café.

name: John and Mary
summary_text: John and Mary meet in a singles bar, sleep together, and spend the next day getting to know each other.

name: White Mane
summary_text: In the Camargue, France, a young boy bonds with a white haired horse that escaped from ranchers.

summary_text: Judge Priest, a proud Confederate veteran, uses common sense and considerable humanity to dispense justice in a small town in the Post-Bellum Kentucky.

summary_text: Tyrannical, but ailing, tycoon Charles Richmond becomes very fond of his attractive Italian nurse, Maria. The nurse, in turn, falls in love with Charles' ne'er-do-well nephew Anthony, who plots ways to gain control of his uncle's fortune.

summary_text: During the thirteenth century, the shy Mongol boy Temujin (Carlo Cura) becomes the fearless leader Genghis Khan (Omar Sharif), who unites all Mongol tribes and conquers most of Asia, Europe, and the Middle East.

summary_text: Travelers in the 1870s Southwest discuss a recent murder trial in which all the principals told differing stories about the events.

Things get steamier when Béatrix's lover Mathieu shows up, and Marc's old flame appears.

summary_text: It is about a teenager from a Dalit (Oppressed caste) family, who lives at the village fringe, and falls in love with an upper caste girl.

name: Haebaragi
summary_text: Released from prison, Taesik goes to live with an adopted mother. He takes a job and tries to live a quiet life with his new family. His efforts are threatened when a politician seeks to knock the family restaurant down to build a mall.

name: The Color of Lies
summary_text: In a small Breton town, a 10-year-old girl is found murdered. René, her art teacher, a professional painter, is the last person to have seen her alive. The inspector in charge of the ...                See full summary »

name: Kit Kat
summary_text: Sheikh Hosny is a blind man who lives with his old mother and his frustrated son in the Kit Kat neighborhood. His son Youssef dreams of going to Europe to find work, and has a relationship ...                See full summary »

name: Troma's War
summary_text: A group of assorted Americans survive a plane crash in a Caribbean island, and discover it is infested with crawling snakes and other venomous beasts. Even worse, terrorists are preparing a full out war on America with a biological weapon.

name: Alexandre le bienheureux
summary_text: Alexandre, a young and honest farmer, is oppressed by an authoritarian wife, who makes him work like a dog. When she dies in a car crash, he decides to stay in bed, absolutely free and ...                See full summary »

name: Walk on the Wild Side
summary_text: A man arrives in New Orleans searching for his former girlfriend, an artist who now works in a bordello.

name: The Spy in Black
summary_text: A German submarine is sent to the Orkney Isles in 1917 to sink the British fleet.

name: Shadows
summary_text: The son of a reputable physician struggles to live up to other people's expectations of him, until one day he is confronted by people who appear to die time and again.

name: Miffo
summary_text: Suburban priest falls in love with woman in wheelchair.

name: Little Ghost
summary_text: While on location in a spooky Romanian villa with his Hollywood big-shot mom and her dorky boyfriend, twelve-year-old Kevin befriends a Renaissance-era girl ghost who helps him cause unrest on the set.

name: Charlie Chan at the Opera
summary_text: A dangerous amnesiac escapes from an asylum, hides in the opera house, and is suspected of getting revenge on those who tried to murder him 13 years ago.

name: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi
summary_text: The story is based on four childhood friends who go on a trip to Goa. Each have their own dream careers, and collaborate to make a short film.

name: The Death of Louis XIV
summary_text: Upon returning from a hunting expedition, King Louis XIV feels a sharp pain in his leg. He begins to die, surrounded by loyal followers in the royal chambers.

name: Everything's Gone Green
summary_text: Ryan, a good-natured slacker, is tempted into a money laundering scheme while working for a lottery magazine. A capitalistic comedy that asks the question - when is "enough" enough?

name: Strandvaskaren
summary_text: Hundred years ago, three students at the Hellestads Boarding School were brutally slaughtered, the murderer drowned himself in a lake nearby and his body was never found. The story has ...                See full summary »

name: Company Man
summary_text: A high school teacher in the 60s becomes an international spy and becomes involved in a plot to overthrow Fidel Castro.

name: Det forsømte forår
summary_text: We follow 4 classmates in a strict boys' secondary school in 1950s Copenhagen, where a sadistic teacher torments his students. We meet them again at their 35 year class reunion.

name: Day the World Ended
summary_text: In a post-Apocalyptic world after an atomic war seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.

name: Christmas Next Door
summary_text: Eric Randall (Jesse Metcalfe), a famous author who writes about how to stay a bachelor is forced to look after his niece and nephew over the holidays and, with the help of his Christmas-loving neighbor, April Stewart (Fiona Gubelmann), he learns to find love and the Christmas spirit.

name: Demetri Martin: Live (At the Time)
summary_text: Demetri Martin performs his newest stand-up routine at The Lincoln Theater in Washington D.C.

name: Tenshi no koi
summary_text: Seventeen year old high school student Rio Ozawa is always the center of attention due to her beauty. Yet Rio has never cared about anyone but herself due to her traumatic past. Her friends...                See full summary »

name: No sos vos, soy yo
summary_text: Javier, a thirty-year-old doctor, is about to travel to Miami to meet again with María, his wife, until she calls him to confess that he has fallen in love with another and that the ...                See full summary »

name: L'ennui
summary_text: Martin is a philosophy teacher in the midst of a mid-life crisis. Lacking direction or purpose in his life, he initiates an affair with Cécilia, a young artist's model who might have killed her former lover.

name: Miranda
summary_text: In this erotic comedy, Miranda is the landlady of a small country tavern who is looking for a husband, and tries out a variety of men for size.

name: Carry on Regardless
summary_text: The Helping Hands agency employs some very strange people to perform some very strange jobs. Even the simplest of tasks get bungled by the incompetent but lovable staff.

name: Lover for a Day
summary_text: A young woman returns home after the breakdown of a relationship to discover her father is dating a woman her age.

name: Aloys
summary_text: A lonely private investigator is contacted by a mysterious woman who pulls him into a mind game known as 'telephone walking'. Fascinated by her voice, Aloys discovers an imaginary universe that allows him to break out of his isolation.

name: Accidentally Engaged
summary_text: A waitress/actress in LA is back home for a friend's bridal shower. She lets her friends believe, that she's dating the hot actor Chas. Returning to LA, she meets Chas, who has his own reasons for keeping the rumor alive.

name: Comet in Moominland
summary_text: Moomin, Sniff and My set out to stop a comet approaching the Moomin valley. Along the way they meet Snusmumriken, the beautiful Snorkfröken, Snorken and a Hemul, who join them in their quest.

name: Junk Mail
summary_text: A lazy postman puts his nose where it doesn't belong.

name: The Jonsson Gang's Greatest Robbery
summary_text: When Vanheden and Dynamit-Harry tries to break doctor Busé out of jail, they get Herman Melvin instead. He has been working at the Swedish Mint and the doctor, who has started to think like...                See full summary »

name: City in the Sea
summary_text: In 1903, in Cornwall, a group of locals discover an underwater city, dating back to 1803, that hides a society of smugglers and aquatic creatures.

name: Jack of the Red Hearts
summary_text: A teenage con artist tricks a desperate mother into hiring her as a live-in companion for her autistic daughter.

name: Xiao shi de zi dan
summary_text: Son Donglu, a newly promoted detective teams up with Guo Zhui, fastest gunman in Tiancheng and Xiaowu, a novice policeman to investigate the mystery deaths in a bullet factory.

name: House of Fears
summary_text: The night before a local haunted house opens for Halloween, six friends sneak in for a few hours of fun. Soon after entering, they find themselves trapped inside with no way out. Their ...                See full summary »

name: Class of Nuke 'Em High Part II: Subhumanoid Meltdown
summary_text: When school reporter Roger Smith meets a beautiful subhumanoid named Victoria, they fall in love but becomes determined to save her and the new school from a giant mutant squirrel, Tromie.

name: Rampage
summary_text: Liberal district attorney decides to seek the death penalty for a man who slaughtered a family at Christmastime, then drank their blood. He escapes, though, and starts killing again.

name: All These Women
summary_text: A critic blackmails a famous musician with his biography filled with the revelations of many of his women.

name: Vault
summary_text: Vault tells a story about a group of small time criminals in 1975 who attempt to pull off the biggest heist in American history: stealing over $30 million from the Mafia in the smallest state in the union, Rhode Island.

name: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
summary_text: A young woman with Asperger's syndrome tries to find her first boyfriend with a little help from her older sister.

name: I Hate Summer
summary_text: Three families end up in the same rented house. Throughout the summer, they become friends and rediscover how to enjoy life.

name: Turist Ömer
summary_text: Turist Ömer is a poor man. He finds a job in bank to distribute fake money for advertisement. He accidentally takes the bag full of real money from the burglars. He spends the money for his friends' needs while the burglars search for him.

name: A Rage in Harlem
summary_text: A gangster's girlfriend flees to Harlem with a trunkload of gold after a shootout, unaware that the rest of the gang are on her trail.

name: Sword of the Valiant
summary_text: The Green Knight challenges King Arthur's knights. But only young Gawain accepts and decapitates him. The knight takes his head and now gives Gawain one year to learn about virtues, knighthood and then face the challenge himself.

name: Belyy Bim Chernoe ukho
summary_text: A white dog called Bim is looking for its owner. It encounters all kinds of people and situations.

name: Screwed
summary_text: The film is a semi-biographical story based on the experiences of former prison guard Ronnie Thompson who spent seven years working in some of the UK's most dangerous prisons. Based on ...                See full summary »

name: The String
summary_text: Malik has a lot on his plate when he returns home to Tunisia after living in France. He's processing his father's death, he can't come out to his mother, and his childhood anxieties have ...                See full summary »

name: The Girl from the Naked Eye
summary_text: When Sandy, a call girl at "The Naked Eye", ends up dead, her friend and only ally in the world, Jake, goes on a manhunt to find out who killed her.

name: The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
summary_text: A young gay man tries to balance his career as a personal assistant while searching for love.

name: Revenge of the Dead
summary_text: Stefano, a young journalist, buys a used typewriter and accidentally sees that some text is still readable on the ribbon. He manages to reconstruct the story of a scientist, Paolo Zeder, ...                See full summary »

name: Warlords of the Deep
summary_text: Searching for the lost world of Atlantis, Prof. Aitken, his son Charles and Greg Collinson are betrayed by the crew of their expedition's ship, attracted by the fabulous treasures of ...                See full summary »

name: 200 Motels
summary_text: The great Frank Zappa's outrageous psychedelic precursor to today's music videos features "The Mothers of Invention" wreaking havoc in a typical American town. Ringo Starr narrates.

name: Tower of London
summary_text: The twisted Richard III is haunted by the ghosts of those he has murdered in his attempt to become the King of England.

name: Friend Zone
summary_text: In this world, there are many people who seem to be wandering along a relationship border-lining 'friends' and 'lovers'. This borderline is also commonly known as the FRIEND ZONE. It is a ...                See full summary »

name: Detective Chinatown 2
summary_text: Tang and Qin team up to solve a murder in New York's Chinatown.

name: Sgt. Stubby: An American Hero
summary_text: The true story of a stray dog who joins his new master on the battlefields of the First World War. For his valorous actions, Sgt. Stubby is still recognized as the most decorated dog in American history.

name: Dinocroc vs. Supergator
summary_text: Created in the laboratories of a biotech corporation, two ravenous mega-reptiles level everything in their way. Now, three defenders must try to save the day. Who shall live and who shall die in the battle between Dinocroc and Supergator?

name: Miracle in Lane 2
summary_text: Based on a true story, a 13-year-old boy who uses a wheelchair is determined to win a trophy like his athletic older brother.

name: Queen of Outer Space
summary_text: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.

name: The Birthday Wish
summary_text: On her birthday, a woman who desperately wants her boyfriend to propose to her wishes for the opportunity to see into the future, with surprising results.

name: All Things Valentine
summary_text: A blogger who has had terrible luck on Valentine's days meets a handsome veterinarian. Then she finds out he is the one who has been leaving rude comments on her Valentines day articles and she questions if her luck has changed at all.

name: They Found Hell
summary_text: A group of college students are trapped in hell after a teleportation experiment goes awry, and the inhabitants are determined to devour their souls.

name: Rapt
summary_text: A rich industrialist is brutally kidnapped. While he physically and mentally degenerates in imprisonment, the kidnappers, police and the board of the company of which he is director negotiate about the ransom of 50 million euro.

name: Miss Marple: Nemesis
summary_text: Miss Marple receives a cryptic letter requesting her to right an unknown injustice, but receives no hint other than a ticket for guided tour of historic homes.

name: 500 MPH Storm
summary_text: When an energy experiment goes haywire, a rash of massive hurricanes rips across North America. A scientist must get his family to safety before the hurricanes merge, creating a "hypercane" with the power to wipe America off the map.

name: For Ellen
summary_text: A struggling musician takes an overnight long-distance drive in order to fight his estranged wife for custody of their young daughter.

name: Charles Darwin and the Tree of Life
summary_text: A documentary about evolution.

name: Made in Hungaria
summary_text: In 1963 in Communist controlled Hungary, Miki, a young musician, returns after living in America and tries to win back his old flame Vera who has taken up with a musician rival of his named Röné who is also a part-time thief on the side.

name: The Graves
summary_text: Two inseparable sister's visit to a remote mine town turns into a mind-bending fight for survival against menaces both human and supernatural.

name: Street Thief
summary_text: The movie follows the life of Chicago burglar Kaspar Karr. Kaspar cases and robs stores. He counts up his score and a small interview follows where Kaspar introduces himself. He shows his ...                See full summary »

name: In My Sleep
summary_text: A sleepwalking, sexaholic masseur wakes up, covered in blood next to a bloody knife, when cops ring the doorbell.

name: The Little Drummer Girl
summary_text: An American actress with a penchant for lying is forcibly recruited by Mossad, the Israeli intelligence agency, to trap a Palestinian bomber, by pretending to be the girlfriend of his dead brother.

name: Tie pohjoiseen
summary_text: A father who was absent for 30 years of his son's life returns and wants to bond with his son, on a road trip to the north.

name: 388 Arletta Avenue
summary_text: A young couple find themselves in an unnerving situation with a mysterious stalker.

name: Arunachalam
summary_text: The movie revolves around Arunachalam (Rajini), who is the son of the VIP of a village who finds out about his past but destiny has its own play.

name: The Object of Beauty
summary_text: This story is about a ne'er do well and his girlfriend search for a thief.

name: Wonder Man
summary_text: After being murdered by gangsters, an exuberant nightclub entertainer returns as a ghost to persuade his meek twin brother to help bring his killers to justice.

name: Edie
summary_text: 83 year old Edie believes that it is never too late - packing an old camping bag, leaving her life behind and embarking on an adventure she never got to have - climbing the imposing Mount Suilven in Scotland.

name: Wish Man
summary_text: One boy's wish changed a man. One man's wish changed the world.

name: I-4: Loufa & apallagi
summary_text: Five I4 soldiers serve in the army as auxiliaries in a unit supporting commando troops during military training. Due to all the chores and the pack drills, the soldiers will be forced to ...                See full summary »

name: Hura gâru
summary_text: Young women in a small Japanese town look to revive their home's declining fortunes by building a Hawaiian village tourist attraction.

name: Jan Dara
summary_text: Jan Dara grows up in a house lacking in love but abundant in lust. He quickly picks up the sinful way of life of his stepfather, Khun Luang who married his mother after she became pregnant ...                See full summary »

name: Class Reunion
summary_text: It's been 10 years since Lizzie Borden High School's class of '72 graduated, and the preppies, the hippies and the in-crowd has returned to reminisce over good times past. But classmate Walter Baylor has returned too with a vengeance.

name: The Baron of Arizona
summary_text: Master swindler James Reavis painstakingly spends years forging documents and land grants that will make his wife and him undisputed owners of the entire state of Arizona.

name: All Through the House
summary_text: A deranged masked Santa-Slayer comes to town for some yuletide-terror. He leaves behind a bloody trail of mutilated bodies as he hunts his way to the front steps of the town's most feared and notorious home.

name: Antboy
summary_text: 12-year-old Pelle is bitten by an ant and develops superpowers. Aided by comic book nerd Wilhelm, Pelle creates a secret identity as superhero Antboy. When a super villain The Flea enters the scene, Antboy must step up to the challenge.

name: Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
summary_text: Goku and Krillin want to be trained in the martial arts by the great Master Roshi. The only way he will agree to train them is if they go to Devil's Castle to find the Sleeping Princess, who is being held prisoner by Count Lucifer, and bring her back to his island.

name: King & Country
summary_text: During World War I, Army Private Arthur James Hamp is accused of desertion during battle. The officer assigned to defend him at his court-martial, Captain Hargreaves, finds out there is more to the case than meets the eye.

name: Desperate Journey
summary_text: When the crew of a downed British bomber escape from their Nazi captors with Top Secret intelligence, they make a desperate journey to get out of Germany alive.

name: Fanney Khan
summary_text: Fanney Khan is a struggling singer who wants to make his daughter a big name in music world.
